title: Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi Sleeveless
title_original: Women Sexy Knitted Turtleneck Side Split Sleeveless Sweater Dress Long Maxi Dresses Pullover Top

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #230,025 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,161 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, with one mentioning it's good for wrapping into a sweater. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as poor. Moreover, the size also gets mixed reviews, with one customer noting it doesn't match the picture shown. Additionally, the chain strength is concerning, with one customer reporting it broke extremely fast.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: This top is very nice. It is thick and when styled adds a sexy look to the outfit. I am short so it is long but some heels helps a bit. I can't wait to style it and wear it out. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my outfit
items.body: Super cute outfit was amazing Read more
items.author: Patrice Duckett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I need to order the other colors . I love how long it is. I should have put my heels on to see how it really would look on me . I love it . Can’t wait to wear it for date night Read more
items.author: keyanda Armstead

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap quality sweater material.
items.body: Cheap sweater material. Does not fit like picture. Good for wrapping into a cute sweater though. Read more
items.author: cassandra m.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love IT!!!
items.body: I got the Red one!! I loved It. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Likable
items.body: I like the flow, but the chain broke extremely fast Read more
items.author: Shaunda Simpson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so cute got alot of compliments!
items.author: Very bad, arrived broken, poor packaging., very tiny the picture lies

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 01apricot, 05green, 02red, 03orange, 06gray, 04blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
